title: Media control notifications keep reappearing for apps, hours or days after I last used them.
content:
Media control notifications will constantly reappear in the notification shade and on the lock screen hours or days after I viewed the content. For example, I listened to a podcast one night and every 30 minutes or so, the controls would pop up again for that same podcast. This continued for about 6 days until it switched to a random youtube video.

A factory reset did not fix.
